generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with yellow pedestrian crossing stripes and dashed lane markings, which are typical of a road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, separated by a curb and adjacent to a wall.
- building: A multi-story building with illuminated windows is visible on the left side of the image.
- wall: A concrete wall runs along the right side of the sidewalk.
- pole: Streetlight poles are visible along the road, including one near the center and others further in the background.
- person: A person is standing on the sidewalk near the left edge of the image, partially blurred due to motion.
- train: A tram, which is a type of train, is visible on the left side of the road, moving parallel to the camera's perspective.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a dark sky, with some faint lights from distant buildings.
- vegetation: Dark silhouettes of trees or bushes are visible on the right side of the image, behind the wall.
- car: The hood of a car is visible at the bottom of the image, indicating the perspective is from inside a vehicle.
